item.description:
Good news Everyone!

 

In honor of Ray Bradbury's passing we are going to read The Martian Chronicles, a fix-up novel written in 1950! I expect it to be hilariously outdated yet strangely intriguing.

 

From the Amazon synopsis:

A short story collection by Ray Bradbury that chronicles the colonization of Mars by humans fleeing from a troubled and eventually atomically devastated Earth, and the conflict between aboriginal Martians and the new colonists.

 

We will be meeting at Comicazi on Highland Ave in Davis Square. There is metered parking all along Highland as well as a public lot on Day Street near Redbones. There is also T access and bus connections.

 

Since The Martian Chronicles are rather short, we planned to also talk about Fahrenheit 451 but it is not necessary. As always, as long as you don't mind spoilers stop by!

 

See you there!  
-Josh
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back of the store.
item.name: August Book Club Meeting
